ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(AND(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'FP_Account', ISPICKVAL(Record_Country__c, 'Japan')), AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Phone)), OR( NOT(REGEX(Phone,"^((\\+81)?\\d{10,11})?$")), NOT(REGEX(Phone, "\\+[0-9 ]+")) ), NOT($Permission.Exclude_from_Validation) ) , false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please add phone in the right format. It should start with +81 and be followed by 10 to 11 digits, without space
